summary: Sync-work skill syncs docs and configs to GitHub

  当前claude alias登录方式不变                                       但是当前运行cccc还是现实 Settings:  Status   Config   Usage  (←/→ or tab to cycle)


  Version: 2.1.3

content.thinking:
用户想要创建一个新的 `cccc` alias，使用不同的 API 配置（第三方 API 端点和密钥），而保持原来的 `claude` alias 不变。

用户提到当前运行 `cccc` 还是显示原来的登录方式（Claude Max Account），说明 `cccc` alias 可能已经存在但配置不正确。

让我先检查一下用户的 shell 配置文件，看看当前的 alias 是如何设置的。

content.text: 让我先检查一下你当前的 shell 配置和 cccc alias 是如何设置的。

content.thinking:
我看到了问题。用户的 `cccc` alias 设置了环境变量，但它调用的是 `claude`，而 `claude` alias 本身会清除这些环境变量（使用 `env -u`）：

```bash
alias claude='env -u ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -u ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN -u ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'
```

所以当 `cccc` 设置了 `ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL` 和 `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` 后调用 `claude` alias，这些环境变量就被 `env -u` 清除了，导致还是使用了默认的登录方式。

解决方案是让 `cccc` 直接调用 `/home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude` 而不是通过 `claude` alias。

让我修改 `.bashrc` 文件来修复这个问题。

content.text:
找到问题了！你的 `cccc` alias 调用的是 `claude` alias，而 `claude` alias 会使用 `env -u` 清除环境变量。所以你设置的 API 端点和密钥被清除了。

让我先读取完整的 `.bashrc` 文件，然后修复这个问题。

file.content:
# === 5.1 Claude CLI Aliases ===
# 加载 Claude 相关环境变量
[ -f "$HOME/.claude/env" ] && source "$HOME/.claude/env"

# claude: 使用 htdong@gmail.com 官方账号（付费订阅）
alias claude='env -u ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -u ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN -u ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# cc: 使用 Neurax API Key（主力使用）
alias cc='CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR=$CC_CONFIG_DIR \
  XDG_STATE_HOME=$CC_STATE_HOME \
  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$CC_API_KEY \
  ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=$CC_BASE_URL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=$CC_OPUS_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=$CC_SONNET_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=$CC_HAIKU_MODEL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --model opus --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# glm: 使用 Z.AI GLM 4.7 模型
alias glm='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=$ZAI_GLM_KEY \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# === 5.2 其他工具 Aliases ===
# Codex CLI
alias codex='codex -m gpt-5 -c model_reasoning_effort="high" \
  --search --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox'

# Gemini CLI
alias gemini='gemini -yolo'

# ============================================================================
# END OF CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================
alias cccc="ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD claude"
alias cccc="ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD claude"

content.thinking:
现在我清楚了。问题是 `cccc` 调用的是 `claude` alias（它会清除环境变量），而不是直接调用 `/home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude`。

我需要：
1. 删除第 223 和 224 行的重复错误 alias
2. 在合适的位置（比如在 `glm` alias 之后）添加正确的 `cccc` alias

正确的 alias 应该直接调用 `/home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude`，并设置正确的环境变量。

content.text: 现在我明白问题了。`cccc` alias 调用了 `claude` alias，但 `claude` alias 会用 `env -u` 清除环境变量。让我修复这个问题：

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# ~/.bashrc: executed by bash(1) for non-login shells.
# see /usr/share/doc/bash/examples/startup-files (in the package bash-doc)
# for examples

# If not running interactively, don't do anything
case $- in
    *i*) ;;
      *) return;;
esac

# don't put duplicate lines or lines starting with space in the history.
# See bash(1) for more options
HISTCONTROL=ignoreboth

# append to the history file, don't overwrite it
shopt -s histappend

# for setting history length see HISTSIZE and HISTFILESIZE in bash(1)
HISTSIZE=1000
HISTFILESIZE=2000

# check the window size after each command and, if necessary,
# update the values of LINES and COLUMNS.
shopt -s checkwinsize

# If set, the pattern "**" used in a pathname expansion context will
# match all files and zero or more directories and subdirectories.
#shopt -s globstar

# make less more friendly for non-text input files, see lesspipe(1)
[ -x /usr/bin/lesspipe ] && eval "$(SHELL=/bin/sh lesspipe)"

# set variable identifying the chroot you work in (used in the prompt below)
if [ -z "${debian_chroot:-}" ] && [ -r /etc/debian_chroot ]; then
    debian_chroot=$(cat /etc/debian_chroot)
fi

# set a fancy prompt (non-color, unless we know we "want" color)
case "$TERM" in
    xterm-color|*-256color) color_prompt=yes;;
esac

# uncomment for a colored prompt, if the terminal has the capability; turned
# off by default to not distract the user: the focus in a terminal window
# should be on the output of commands, not on the prompt
#force_color_prompt=yes

if [ -n "$force_color_prompt" ]; then
    if [ -x /usr/bin/tput ] && tput setaf 1 >&/dev/null; then
	# We have color support; assume it's compliant with Ecma-48
	# (ISO/IEC-6429). (Lack of such support is extremely rare, and such
	# a case would tend to support setf rather than setaf.)
	color_prompt=yes
    else
	color_prompt=
    fi
fi

if [ "$color_prompt" = yes ]; then
    PS1='${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\[\033[01;32m\]\u@\h\[\033[00m\]:\[\033[01;34m\]\w\[\033[00m\]\$ '
else
    PS1='${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\u@\h:\w\$ '
fi
unset color_prompt force_color_prompt

# If this is an xterm set the title to user@host:dir
case "$TERM" in
xterm*|rxvt*)
    PS1="\[\e]0;${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\u@\h: \w\a\]$PS1"
    ;;
*)
    ;;
esac

# enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases
if [ -x /usr/bin/dircolors ]; then
    test -r ~/.dircolors && eval "$(dircolors -b ~/.dircolors)" || eval "$(dircolors -b)"
    alias ls='ls --color=auto'
    #alias dir='dir --color=auto'
    #alias vdir='vdir --color=auto'

    alias grep='grep --color=auto'
    alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto'
    alias egrep='egrep --color=auto'
fi

# colored GCC warnings and errors
#export GCC_COLORS='error=01;31:warning=01;35:note=01;36:caret=01;32:locus=01:quote=01'

# some more ls aliases
alias ll='ls -alF'
alias la='ls -A'
alias l='ls -CF'

# Add an "alert" alias for long running commands.  Use like so:
#   sleep 10; alert
alias alert='notify-send --urgency=low -i "$([ $? = 0 ] && echo terminal || echo error)" "$(history|tail -n1|sed -e '\''s/^\s*[0-9]\+\s*//;s/[;&|]\s*alert$//'\'')"'

# Alias definitions.
# You may want to put all your additions into a separate file like
# ~/.bash_aliases, instead of adding them here directly.
# See /usr/share/doc/bash-doc/examples in the bash-doc package.

if [ -f ~/.bash_aliases ]; then
    . ~/.bash_aliases
fi

# enable programmable completion features (you don't need to enable
# this, if it's already enabled in /etc/bash.bashrc and /etc/profile
# sources /etc/bash.bashrc).
if ! shopt -oq posix; then
  if [ -f /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion ]; then
    . /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion
  elif [ -f /etc/bash_completion ]; then
    . /etc/bash_completion
  fi
fi

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 2: 包管理器初始化
# ============================================================================

# >>> conda initialize >>>
# !! Contents within this block are managed by 'conda init' !!
__conda_setup="$('/data/anaconda3/bin/conda' 'shell.bash' 'hook' 2> /dev/null)"
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    eval "$__conda_setup"
else
    if [ -f "/data/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" ]; then
        . "/data/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh"
    else
        export PATH="/data/anaconda3/bin:$PATH"
    fi
fi
unset __conda_setup
# <<< conda initialize <<<
conda activate ai

# >>> nvm initialize >>>
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"  # This loads nvm
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"  # This loads nvm bash_completion
# <<< nvm initialize <<<

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 3: 环境变量配置
# ============================================================================

# === 3.1 加载敏感信息（API Keys 等） ===
[ -f "$HOME/.env" ] && source "$HOME/.env"

# === 3.2 历史记录配置（优化） ===
# 注意：这部分覆盖前面的系统默认值
export HISTSIZE=10000
export HISTFILESIZE=20000

# === 3.3 网络代理配置 ===
# 注：同时设置大小写版本以确保兼容性
export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export https_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export all_proxy=socks5://127.0.0.1:10808
export HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export ALL_PROXY=socks5://127.0.0.1:10808
export NO_PROXY=.slopus.com,api.cluster-fluster.com,happy-api.slopus.com,localhost,127.0.0.1,.local

# === 3.4 应用特定配置 ===
export HAPPY_SERVER_URL=https://api.cluster-fluster.com
export DOTNET_ROOT="$HOME/.dotnet"
export DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP=0
export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun"

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 4: PATH 配置（集中管理，去除重复）
# ============================================================================
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"                      # 用户本地程序
export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$DOTNET_ROOT/tools:$PATH"     # .NET SDK
export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH"                      # Bun runtime
export PATH="$HOME/.opencode/bin:$PATH"                   # OpenCode

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 5: Aliases 配置
# ============================================================================

# === 5.1 Claude CLI Aliases ===
# 加载 Claude 相关环境变量
[ -f "$HOME/.claude/env" ] && source "$HOME/.claude/env"

# claude: 使用 htdong@gmail.com 官方账号（付费订阅）
alias claude='env -u ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -u ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN -u ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# cc: 使用 Neurax API Key（主力使用）
alias cc='CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR=$CC_CONFIG_DIR \
  XDG_STATE_HOME=$CC_STATE_HOME \
  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$CC_API_KEY \
  ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=$CC_BASE_URL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=$CC_OPUS_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=$CC_SONNET_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=$CC_HAIKU_MODEL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --model opus --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# glm: 使用 Z.AI GLM 4.7 模型
alias glm='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=$ZAI_GLM_KEY \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# === 5.2 其他工具 Aliases ===
# Codex CLI
alias codex='codex -m gpt-5 -c model_reasoning_effort="high" \
  --search --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox'

# Gemini CLI
alias gemini='gemini -yolo'

# ============================================================================
# END OF CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================
alias cccc="ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD claude"
alias cccc="ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD claude"

content.thinking: 好的，我已经删除了末尾的重复错误 alias。现在我需要在正确的位置（在 glm alias 之后）添加正确的 cccc alias。

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# ~/.bashrc: executed by bash(1) for non-login shells.
# see /usr/share/doc/bash/examples/startup-files (in the package bash-doc)
# for examples

# If not running interactively, don't do anything
case $- in
    *i*) ;;
      *) return;;
esac

# don't put duplicate lines or lines starting with space in the history.
# See bash(1) for more options
HISTCONTROL=ignoreboth

# append to the history file, don't overwrite it
shopt -s histappend

# for setting history length see HISTSIZE and HISTFILESIZE in bash(1)
HISTSIZE=1000
HISTFILESIZE=2000

# check the window size after each command and, if necessary,
# update the values of LINES and COLUMNS.
shopt -s checkwinsize

# If set, the pattern "**" used in a pathname expansion context will
# match all files and zero or more directories and subdirectories.
#shopt -s globstar

# make less more friendly for non-text input files, see lesspipe(1)
[ -x /usr/bin/lesspipe ] && eval "$(SHELL=/bin/sh lesspipe)"

# set variable identifying the chroot you work in (used in the prompt below)
if [ -z "${debian_chroot:-}" ] && [ -r /etc/debian_chroot ]; then
    debian_chroot=$(cat /etc/debian_chroot)
fi

# set a fancy prompt (non-color, unless we know we "want" color)
case "$TERM" in
    xterm-color|*-256color) color_prompt=yes;;
esac

# uncomment for a colored prompt, if the terminal has the capability; turned
# off by default to not distract the user: the focus in a terminal window
# should be on the output of commands, not on the prompt
#force_color_prompt=yes

if [ -n "$force_color_prompt" ]; then
    if [ -x /usr/bin/tput ] && tput setaf 1 >&/dev/null; then
	# We have color support; assume it's compliant with Ecma-48
	# (ISO/IEC-6429). (Lack of such support is extremely rare, and such
	# a case would tend to support setf rather than setaf.)
	color_prompt=yes
    else
	color_prompt=
    fi
fi

if [ "$color_prompt" = yes ]; then
    PS1='${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\[\033[01;32m\]\u@\h\[\033[00m\]:\[\033[01;34m\]\w\[\033[00m\]\$ '
else
    PS1='${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\u@\h:\w\$ '
fi
unset color_prompt force_color_prompt

# If this is an xterm set the title to user@host:dir
case "$TERM" in
xterm*|rxvt*)
    PS1="\[\e]0;${debian_chroot:+($debian_chroot)}\u@\h: \w\a\]$PS1"
    ;;
*)
    ;;
esac

# enable color support of ls and also add handy aliases
if [ -x /usr/bin/dircolors ]; then
    test -r ~/.dircolors && eval "$(dircolors -b ~/.dircolors)" || eval "$(dircolors -b)"
    alias ls='ls --color=auto'
    #alias dir='dir --color=auto'
    #alias vdir='vdir --color=auto'

    alias grep='grep --color=auto'
    alias fgrep='fgrep --color=auto'
    alias egrep='egrep --color=auto'
fi

# colored GCC warnings and errors
#export GCC_COLORS='error=01;31:warning=01;35:note=01;36:caret=01;32:locus=01:quote=01'

# some more ls aliases
alias ll='ls -alF'
alias la='ls -A'
alias l='ls -CF'

# Add an "alert" alias for long running commands.  Use like so:
#   sleep 10; alert
alias alert='notify-send --urgency=low -i "$([ $? = 0 ] && echo terminal || echo error)" "$(history|tail -n1|sed -e '\''s/^\s*[0-9]\+\s*//;s/[;&|]\s*alert$//'\'')"'

# Alias definitions.
# You may want to put all your additions into a separate file like
# ~/.bash_aliases, instead of adding them here directly.
# See /usr/share/doc/bash-doc/examples in the bash-doc package.

if [ -f ~/.bash_aliases ]; then
    . ~/.bash_aliases
fi

# enable programmable completion features (you don't need to enable
# this, if it's already enabled in /etc/bash.bashrc and /etc/profile
# sources /etc/bash.bashrc).
if ! shopt -oq posix; then
  if [ -f /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion ]; then
    . /usr/share/bash-completion/bash_completion
  elif [ -f /etc/bash_completion ]; then
    . /etc/bash_completion
  fi
fi

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 2: 包管理器初始化
# ============================================================================

# >>> conda initialize >>>
# !! Contents within this block are managed by 'conda init' !!
__conda_setup="$('/data/anaconda3/bin/conda' 'shell.bash' 'hook' 2> /dev/null)"
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    eval "$__conda_setup"
else
    if [ -f "/data/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" ]; then
        . "/data/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh"
    else
        export PATH="/data/anaconda3/bin:$PATH"
    fi
fi
unset __conda_setup
# <<< conda initialize <<<
conda activate ai

# >>> nvm initialize >>>
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"  # This loads nvm
[ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"  # This loads nvm bash_completion
# <<< nvm initialize <<<

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 3: 环境变量配置
# ============================================================================

# === 3.1 加载敏感信息（API Keys 等） ===
[ -f "$HOME/.env" ] && source "$HOME/.env"

# === 3.2 历史记录配置（优化） ===
# 注意：这部分覆盖前面的系统默认值
export HISTSIZE=10000
export HISTFILESIZE=20000

# === 3.3 网络代理配置 ===
# 注：同时设置大小写版本以确保兼容性
export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export https_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export all_proxy=socks5://127.0.0.1:10808
export HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:10808
export ALL_PROXY=socks5://127.0.0.1:10808
export NO_PROXY=.slopus.com,api.cluster-fluster.com,happy-api.slopus.com,localhost,127.0.0.1,.local

# === 3.4 应用特定配置 ===
export HAPPY_SERVER_URL=https://api.cluster-fluster.com
export DOTNET_ROOT="$HOME/.dotnet"
export DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP=0
export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun"

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 4: PATH 配置（集中管理，去除重复）
# ============================================================================
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"                      # 用户本地程序
export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$DOTNET_ROOT/tools:$PATH"     # .NET SDK
export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH"                      # Bun runtime
export PATH="$HOME/.opencode/bin:$PATH"                   # OpenCode

# ============================================================================
# SECTION 5: Aliases 配置
# ============================================================================

# === 5.1 Claude CLI Aliases ===
# 加载 Claude 相关环境变量
[ -f "$HOME/.claude/env" ] && source "$HOME/.claude/env"

# claude: 使用 htdong@gmail.com 官方账号（付费订阅）
alias claude='env -u ANTHROPIC_API_KEY -u ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN -u ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# cc: 使用 Neurax API Key（主力使用）
alias cc='CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR=$CC_CONFIG_DIR \
  XDG_STATE_HOME=$CC_STATE_HOME \
  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=$CC_API_KEY \
  ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=$CC_BASE_URL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=$CC_OPUS_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=$CC_SONNET_MODEL \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=$CC_HAIKU_MODEL \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --model opus --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# glm: 使用 Z.AI GLM 4.7 模型
alias glm='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=glm-4.7 \
  ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=$ZAI_GLM_KEY \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

# === 5.2 其他工具 Aliases ===
# Codex CLI
alias codex='codex -m gpt-5 -c model_reasoning_effort="high" \
  --search --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox'

# Gemini CLI
alias gemini='gemini -yolo'

# ============================================================================
# END OF CONFIGURATION
# ============================================================================

content.thinking: `.zshrc` 中也有同样错误的 alias，调用的是 `claude` 而不是直接调用 `/home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude`。让我修复它。

input.content:
# cccc: 使用 qiandao API（第三方中转）
alias cccc='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 \
  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD \
  /home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'

content.content:
The file /home/aiscend/.zshrc has been updated. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of the edited file:
     1→# cccc: 使用 qiandao API（第三方中转）
     2→alias cccc='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 \
     3→  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD \

toolUseResult.content:
# cccc: 使用 qiandao API（第三方中转）
alias cccc='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api2.qiandao.mom/v1 \
  ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-Z0kVvuz5cIwtomKfLQH23MuYxsTgG7IuFxSDaeYoV4xwHGqD \

lines: +# cccc: 使用 qiandao API（第三方中转）

content.thinking: 好了，我已经修复了 `.bashrc` 和 `.zshrc` 中的 `cccc` alias。现在用户需要重新加载 shell 配置才能使用新的 alias。让我告诉用户如何操作。

content.text:
已修复。问题是之前的 `cccc` alias 调用的是 `claude` alias，而 `claude` alias 会用 `env -u` 清除环境变量，导致你设置的 API 配置被忽略。

现在 `cccc` 直接调用 `/home/aiscend/.local/bin/claude` 并正确设置环境变量。

请运行以下命令重新加载配置：

```bash
source ~/.bashrc
```

然后再运行 `cccc` 就会使用你指定的 API 端点和密钥了。

summary: Fixing cccc alias API configuration issue
